title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view is resized smaller
OB: When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller on Linux using build 20011127, the two tool items move below the label.
EB: These two tool items should stay on the same line as the label regardless of the view's size. The close button should remain located on the far-right corner.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the Navigator view. 2. Resize the view to a smaller size. Observe that the tool items move below the label.
